name: Live Math Competitions and League
shortDescription: An interactive mental math app with practice modes, live 1v1 competitions, and league events for learners of all ages.
fullDescription:
Live Math Competitions and League is a dynamic platform for improving arithmetic skills through practice, competitions, and leagues. Designed for all ages, it combines gamification with interactive math challenges to make learning fun and engaging.

Game Modes:

  • Practice Levels: Challenger, Master, and Grandmaster levels with 10 rounds each. Earn badges—Bronze, Silver, or Gold—by completing levels.
  • 1 vs 1 Multiplayer: Challenge friends, random players, or the in-house bot Mathador. Bet coins to compete head-to-head in real-time.
  • Leagues & Events: Form teams of 2 in Leagues to earn points and a Ruby Badge, or compete solo in Events with 3 attempts per 24 hours for an Emerald Badge.

Topics Covered:

Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division, BODMAS, Percentages, Averages, Ratios, Decimals, HCF & LCM, Factors, Exponents, and more
